title: Search for missing girl, 14, who vanished in school uniform
text:
Tyler Byrne, 14, was last seen at 7.30pm last night (Picture: North Wales Police)

Police are searching for a teenager who went missing in her school uniform.

Tyler Byrne, 14, was last seen in Kinmel Bay, north-east Wales, at around 7.30pm on Thursday October 17.

The young girl, from Abergele, was wearing a grey and purple school uniform and holding a tan coloured River Island handbag.

Anyone who has seen Tyler or has any information about her disappearance can call police on 101 and quote reference number X151537.

Got a story for Metro.co.uk? Get in touch with our news team by emailing us at webnews@metro.co.uk. For more stories like this, check our news page.
description: North Wales Police are searching for Tyler Byrne, 14, who was last seen in Kinmel Bay, north-east Wales, at around 7.30pm on Thursday.
